description: This is the main entry point of a Flutter application that sets up the main widget tree, initializes application state with provider for state management, and defines the root UI components including a placeholder screen for tests.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, providing MaterialApp with theme and home screen.

classes.name: _ScaffoldForTests
classes.description: A Scaffold widget used for testing, displaying a message and CircularProgressIndicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter binding and runs the app with top-level providers.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _ScaffoldForTests widgets, constructing UI layout.
